title: Bleep happens; Top 5 Brady quotes; Questionable offenses; Jim McMahon
itunes:title: Bleep happens; Top 5 Brady quotes; Questionable offenses; Jim McMahon
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins looking at how likely it is for the Cincinnati Bengals to get back to the Super Bowl.  Hosts Jane Slater, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt, and Super Bowl champion Michael Robinson share their take on the likelihood the Bengals get back to the big game. Next, Kyle runs through his top-5 favorite Tom Brady quotes and the GMFB crew shares their take on Tom Brady’s future in the FOX booth. Later, they discuss which offense has the most unanswered questions and Peter explains why the Packers offense is the biggest questions mark. The show finishes up being joined by retired quarterback and two-time Super Bowl champion Jim McMahon and he talks about his playing style, the historic 85’ Bears team, and why he wore his Chicago Bears uniform when he visited the White House as a Super Bowl Champion with the Green Bay Packers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
